argumentText:
ARGUMENT
z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ffnfvf.1 | |- F/_ x A |
| 2 |  | ffnfvf.2 | |- F/_ x B |
| 3 |  | ffnfvf.3 | |- F/_ x F |
| 4 |  | #P_ffnfv | |- ( F : A --> B <-> ( F Fn A /\ A. z e. A ( F ` z ) e. B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ z A |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x z |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_nffv | |- F/_ x ( F ` z ) |
| 8 | 7, 2 | #P_nfel | |- F/ x ( F ` z ) e. B |
| 9 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ z ( F ` x ) e. B |
| 10 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( z = x -> ( F ` z ) = ( F ` x ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( z = x -> ( ( F ` z ) e. B <-> ( F ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 1, 8, 9, 11 | #P_cbvralf | |- ( A. z e. A ( F ` z ) e. B <-> A. x e. A ( F ` x ) e. B ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_anbi2i | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ A. z e. A ( F ` z ) e. B ) <-> ( F Fn A /\ A. x e. A ( F ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 13 | #P_bitri | |- ( F : A --> B <-> ( F Fn A /\ A. x e. A ( F ` x ) e. B ) ) |
